key.name: remapper-toggle-overview-key-enabled
key.summary: Use keyboard shortcut to view/hide the window overview.

key.name: remapper-toggle-overview-key
key.summary: Keyboard shortcut to view/hide the window overview.

key.name: remapper-override-hot-corner-enabled
key.summary: Show app view instead of overview when interacting with hot corner.

key.name: remapper-override-activity-button-enabled
key.summary: Show app view instead of overview when using activity button.
